verses.verse: <S%H4310>"Oh<s%> <S%H5414><s%> that you were like a <S%H251>brother<s%> to me Who <S%H3243>nursed<s%> at my mother's <S%H7699>breasts.<s%> [If] I <S%H4672>found<s%> you <S%H2351>outdoors,<s%> I would <S%H5401>kiss<s%> you; <S%H3808>No<s%> one would <S%H936>despise<s%> me, <S%H1571>either.<s%>

"I would <S%H5090>lead<s%> you [and] <S%H935>bring<s%> you Into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H517>mother,<s%> who used to <S%H3925>instruct<s%> me; I would <S%H8248>give<s%> you <S%H7544>spiced<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> to <S%H8248>drink<s%> from the <S%H6071>juice<s%> of my <S%H7416>pomegranates.<s%>
"Let his <S%H8040>left<s%> <S%H8040>hand<s%> be <S%H8478>under<s%> my <S%H7218>head,<s%> And his <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> <S%H2263>embrace<s%> me."

"I want you to <S%H7650>swear,<s%> O <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> Do not <S%H5782>arouse<s%> or <S%H5782>awaken<s%> [my] <S%H160>love,<s%> <S%H5704>Until<s%> she <S%H2654>pleases.<s%>"

<S%H4310>"Who<s%> is <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H5927>coming<s%> up from the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> <S%H7514>Leaning<s%> on her <S%H1730>beloved<s%>?" <S%H8478>"Beneath<s%> the <S%H8598>apple<s%> <S%H8598>tree<s%> I <S%H5782>awakened<s%> you; <S%H8033>There<s%> your <S%H517>mother<s%> was in <S%H9111>labor<s%> with you, <S%H8033>There<s%> she was in <S%H9111>labor<s%> [and] <S%H3205>gave<s%> you <S%H3205>birth.<s%>

<S%H7760>"Put<s%> me like a <S%H2368>seal<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> your <S%H3820>heart,<s%> Like a <S%H2368>seal<s%> on your <S%H2220>arm.<s%> For <S%H160>love<s%> is as <S%H5794>strong<s%> as <S%H4194>death,<s%> <S%H7068>Jealousy<s%> is as <S%H7186>severe<s%> as <S%H7585>Sheol;<s%> Its <S%H7565>flashes<s%> are <S%H7565>flashes<s%> of <S%H784>fire,<s%> The [very] <S%H7957>flame<s%> of the <S%H3050>Lord.<s%>

<S%H7227>"Many<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H3201>cannot<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3518>quench<s%> <S%H160>love,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> will <S%H5104>rivers<s%> <S%H7857>overflow<s%> it; <S%H518>If<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> were to <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1952>riches<s%> of his <S%H1004>house<s%> for <S%H160>love,<s%> It would be <S%H936>utterly<s%> <S%H936>despised.<s%>"

"We have a <S%H6996>little<s%> <S%H269>sister,<s%> And she <S%H369>has<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7699>breasts;<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> shall we <S%H6213>do<s%> for our <S%H269>sister<s%> On the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H7945>when<s%> she is <S%H1696>spoken<s%> for?

<S%H518>"If<s%> she is a <S%H2346>wall,<s%> We shall <S%H1129>build<s%> on her a <S%H2918>battlement<s%> of <S%H3701>silver;<s%> But <S%H518>if<s%> she is a <S%H1817>door,<s%> We shall <S%H6696>barricade<s%> her with <S%H3871>planks<s%> of <S%H730>cedar.<s%>"

"I was a <S%H2346>wall,<s%> and my <S%H7699>breasts<s%> were like <S%H4026>towers;<s%> <S%H227>Then<s%> I <S%H1961>became<s%> in his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> as one who <S%H4672>finds<s%> <S%H7965>peace.<s%>

<S%H8010>"Solomon<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> a <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> at Baal-hamon; He <S%H5414>entrusted<s%> the <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> to <S%H5201>caretakers;<s%> <S%H376>Each<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> was to <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> [shekels] of <S%H3701>silver<s%> for its <S%H6529>fruit.<s%>

"My <S%H7945>very<s%> own <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> is at my <S%H6440>disposal;<s%> The <S%H505>thousand<s%> [shekels] are for you, <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> And two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> are for those who <S%H5201>take<s%> <S%H5201>care<s%> of its <S%H6529>fruit.<s%>"
"O you who <S%H3427>sit<s%> in the <S%H1588>gardens,<s%> [My] <S%H2270>companions<s%> are <S%H7181>listening<s%> for your <S%H6963>voice<s%> â€“ Let me <S%H8085>hear<s%> it!"

<S%H1272>"Hurry,<s%> my <S%H1730>beloved,<s%> And be <S%H1819>like<s%> a <S%H6643>gazelle<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H6082>young<s%> <S%H354>stag<s%> On the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H1314>spices.<s%>"
